generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Item Swing Duration
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Duration, in seconds, of the item's swing animation played when mining or attacking. Affects visuals only and does not impact attack frequency or other gameplay mechanics.

fields.title: Value
fields.description: Duration, in seconds, of the item's swing animation played when mining or attacking. Affects visuals only and does not impact attack frequency or other gameplay mechanics. Default value: 0.3.
